field.filter: SELECT View AS v WHERE v.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT View AS v WHERE v.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT Person AS p WHERE p.org_id = :this->org_id

SELECT Zone AS mz WHERE mz.org_id = :this->org_id AND mz.mapping = 'direct' AND :this->finalclass != 'PTRRecord' UNION SELECT Zone AS mz WHERE mz.org_id = :this->org_id AND mz.mapping IN ('ipv4reverse', 'ipv6reverse') AND :this->finalclass IN ('NSRecord', 'PTRRecord')
